ygData.subject: Re: Pet Question . ..
ygData.msgSnippet: The level one pet spell is fairly useless. Basically you re summoning a decaying skeleton, and you know how easily they die, right? Push on to level 4 and
ygData.messageBody:
The level one pet spell is fairly useless. Basically you're summoning a decaying skeleton, and you know how easily they die, right? Push on to level 4 and you'll find your new pet much more useful.


*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 5/18/99, at 7:27 AM, Mata wrote:

>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>
>So I have a problem, every pet I have summoned has been L1! I made it to
>level 2 yesterday and I summoned 13 skeletons thus far and every single one
>was L1 (coned black while I was 1 and blue while I was 2)
>I read several places that at low lvls we should be able to summon a pet
>that could be above our lvl, I'd be happy w/ a Skel that WAS my lvl.
>
>Does it matter what type of bone chips are used to summon????
>
>
